name: levelupyourcareer.today
description: Official website for the eBook 'Level-Up Your Career Today: Developer Edition' by Jack Domleo

scripts.build: sass --no-source-map scss/normalize.scss css/normalize.min.css --style=compressed && sass --no-source-map scss/cooltipz.scss css/cooltipz.min.css --style=compressed && sass --no-source-map scss/main.scss css/index.min.css --style=compressed && npx postcss css/index.min.css --use autoprefixer --replace --no-map && npx sitemap-generator-cli https://levelupyourcareer.today --last-mod
